shredder 0.0.9

Interacting with tidybayes

Source: vignettes/tidybayes.Rmd
tidybayes.Rmd
library(rstan)
#> Loading required package: ggplot2
#> Loading required package: StanHeaders
#> rstan (Version 2.18.2, GitRev: 2e1f913d3ca3)
#> For execution on a local, multicore CPU with excess RAM we recommend calling
#> options(mc.cores = parallel::detectCores()).
#> To avoid recompilation of unchanged Stan programs, we recommend calling
#> rstan_options(auto_write = TRUE)
library(shredder)
library(tidybayes)

tidybayes

rats <- shredder::rats_example(nCores = 1)

Spread

rats%>%
  tidybayes::spread_draws(mu_alpha,mu_beta)
#> # A tibble: 4,000 x 5
#>    .chain .iteration .draw mu_alpha mu_beta
#>     <int>      <int> <int>    <dbl>   <dbl>
#>  1      1          1     1     245.    6.23
#>  2      1          2     2     240.    6.29
#>  3      1          3     3     246.    6.27
#>  4      1          4     4     237.    6.20
#>  5      1          5     5     244.    6.12
#>  6      1          6     6     242.    6.13
#>  7      1          7     7     241.    6.17
#>  8      1          8     8     248.    6.16
#>  9      1          9     9     242.    6.28
#> 10      1         10    10     245.    6.15
#> # … with 3,990 more rows

rats%>%
  stan_sample_n(2)%>%
  tidybayes::spread_draws(mu_alpha,mu_beta)
#> # A tibble: 8 x 5
#>   .chain .iteration .draw mu_alpha mu_beta
#>    <int>      <int> <int>    <dbl>   <dbl>
#> 1      1          1     1     244.    6.11
#> 2      1          2     2     244.    6.16
#> 3      2          1     3     242.    6.12
#> 4      2          2     4     241.    6.19
#> 5      3          1     5     242.    6.25
#> 6      3          2     6     245.    6.10
#> 7      4          1     7     244.    6.20
#> 8      4          2     8     241.    6.17

rats%>%
  stan_sample_n(2)%>%
  tidybayes::spread_draws(alpha[i],beta[i])
#> # A tibble: 240 x 6
#> # Groups:   i [30]
#>        i alpha .chain .iteration .draw  beta
#>    <int> <dbl>  <int>      <int> <int> <dbl>
#>  1     1  233.      1          1     1  5.66
#>  2     1  236.      1          2     2  6.26
#>  3     1  243.      2          1     3  5.95
#>  4     1  238.      2          2     4  6.17
#>  5     1  240.      3          1     5  6.09
#>  6     1  236.      3          2     6  6.08
#>  7     1  235.      4          1     7  6.39
#>  8     1  240.      4          2     8  6.04
#>  9     2  247.      1          1     1  6.39
#> 10     2  245.      1          2     2  6.83
#> # … with 230 more rows

Gather

rats%>%
  tidybayes::gather_draws(mu_alpha,mu_beta)
#> # A tibble: 8,000 x 5
#> # Groups:   .variable [2]
#>    .chain .iteration .draw .variable .value
#>     <int>      <int> <int> <chr>      <dbl>
#>  1      1          1     1 mu_alpha    245.
#>  2      1          2     2 mu_alpha    240.
#>  3      1          3     3 mu_alpha    246.
#>  4      1          4     4 mu_alpha    237.
#>  5      1          5     5 mu_alpha    244.
#>  6      1          6     6 mu_alpha    242.
#>  7      1          7     7 mu_alpha    241.
#>  8      1          8     8 mu_alpha    248.
#>  9      1          9     9 mu_alpha    242.
#> 10      1         10    10 mu_alpha    245.
#> # … with 7,990 more rows

rats%>%
  stan_sample_n(2)%>%
  tidybayes::gather_draws(mu_alpha,mu_beta)
#> # A tibble: 16 x 5
#> # Groups:   .variable [2]
#>    .chain .iteration .draw .variable .value
#>     <int>      <int> <int> <chr>      <dbl>
#>  1      1          1     1 mu_alpha  240.  
#>  2      1          2     2 mu_alpha  247.  
#>  3      2          1     3 mu_alpha  240.  
#>  4      2          2     4 mu_alpha  239.  
#>  5      3          1     5 mu_alpha  240.  
#>  6      3          2     6 mu_alpha  243.  
#>  7      4          1     7 mu_alpha  241.  
#>  8      4          2     8 mu_alpha  241.  
#>  9      1          1     1 mu_beta     6.14
#> 10      1          2     2 mu_beta     6.19
#> 11      2          1     3 mu_beta     6.18
#> 12      2          2     4 mu_beta     6.18
#> 13      3          1     5 mu_beta     6.25
#> 14      3          2     6 mu_beta     6.15
#> 15      4          1     7 mu_beta     6.13
#> 16      4          2     8 mu_beta     6.40

rats%>%
  stan_sample_n(2)%>%
  tidybayes::gather_draws(alpha[i],beta[i])
#> # A tibble: 480 x 6
#> # Groups:   i, .variable [60]
#>        i .chain .iteration .draw .variable .value
#>    <int>  <int>      <int> <int> <chr>      <dbl>
#>  1     1      1          1     1 alpha       245.
#>  2     1      1          2     2 alpha       235.
#>  3     1      2          1     3 alpha       237.
#>  4     1      2          2     4 alpha       240.
#>  5     1      3          1     5 alpha       238.
#>  6     1      3          2     6 alpha       241.
#>  7     1      4          1     7 alpha       243.
#>  8     1      4          2     8 alpha       240.
#>  9     2      1          1     1 alpha       247.
#> 10     2      1          2     2 alpha       249.
#> # … with 470 more rows
